item.title: 10 Major Health Benefits of Buckwheat Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Buckwheat tea or soba cha is a healthy gluten-free beverage that promotes weight loss and provides many health benefits.  It is made from the seeds of the buckwheat plant, a pseudocereal that has the qualities of cereal but is not counted in the list of cereals. It is similar to grains such as wheat and… Read More »10 Major Health Benefits of Buckwheat Tea

item.title: 8 Major Health Benefits Of Yellow Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Yellow tea is one of the most expensive and luxurious teas in the world. It has a delicious silky taste and distinctive aroma. In Chinese tradition, it is known as huángchá. In the early days, yellow tea was reserved for royal and elite people, but now it is available among the masses and gaining popularity… Read More »8 Major Health Benefits Of Yellow Tea

item.title: 19 Amazing Health Benefits Of Apple Cinnamon Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
What is Apple Cinnamon Tea? An apple cinnamon tea is a seasonal tea that is brewed by using apple peels and the cinnamon as the main ingredients. Both these compounds are a good source of essential nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, polyphenols, and other compounds and provide numerous health benefits. item.title: 11 Major Side Effects of Drinking Too Much Ceylon Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Ceylon tea or Sri Lankan tea is native to Sri Lanka. It is available in different varieties like green Ceylon tea, black Ceylon tea, and white Ceylon tea. This healthy beverage is loaded with nutrients like vitamins minerals antioxidants phytonutrients and flavonoids etc that provide several health and beauty benefits.
